                    Text: 
                    Donate $150+ and get an art glass molecule.

(Pick caffeine, DMT, dopamine, ethanol, harmine, MDMA, mescaline, serotonin, tryptamine, nitrous, THC, or psilocybin)

MDA Dosage

by Erowid

MDA generally comes in either tablet form or as a whitish powder. It is somewhat frequently found in pills sold as MDMA. Likewise, material sold as MDA is somewhat frequently actually MDMA. Following are approximate dosages in mg. Some people are more sensitive to MDA than others. Be careful if you are using MDA for the first time or using material of an unknown purity and strength. There is some disagreement about whether MDA is more potent than MDMA (requiring lower doses), or if they are similarly potent. This is complicated by the fact that most people are not using lab verified materials. Erowid's current view is that the required dose of MDA vs MDMA are very similar, but result in slightly different effects (MDA is more physically stimulating while MDMA is more empathogenic at the same dose).


                    Context: 
                    This section provides dosage guidelines and general information about MDA, a psychoactive chemical sometimes confused with MDMA. It discusses common forms, potency comparisons, user sensitivity, and cautions for first-time or uncertain users. The content appears within Erowid's Chemicals Vault and offers practical harm reduction advice for those considering or researching MDA use.

Drug: MDA | cid: 1614
Source: erowid | Source description: Information on MDA dosages.
Erowid name: mda
Category: CHEMICALS
Field: Dose

                    Text: 
                    Oral MDA Dosages Threshold 30 mg Light 40 - 60 mg Common (small or sensitive people) 60 - 90 mg Common (most people) 75 - 125 mg Common (large or less sensitive people) 110 - 150 mg Strong 150 - 200  mg Heavy 200 +  mg Onset : 20 - 90 minutes (depending on form and stomach contents) Duration : 3 - 6 hours Normal After Effects : up to 24 hours

Every individual reacts differently to every chemical. Know your Body - Know your Mind - Know your Substance - Know your Source. Erowid's dosage information is a summary of data gathered from users, research, and other resources and should not be construed as recommendations.  Individuals can respond differently to the same dosage.  What is safe for one can be deadly for another. Start low with new substances. Have trusted companion/guide/sitter/friend present and/or available.

Created by Erowid - Jan 1, 2000 Modified - Sep 6, 2017


                    Context: 
                    This chunk provides detailed oral dosage guidelines and safety information for MDA, specifying threshold, light, common, strong, and heavy dose ranges, expected onset and duration, and emphasizing individual variability and harm reduction advice. It is part of Erowid's MDA Dosage page, within the Chemicals section, aimed at informing readers about safe use, effects, and precautions associated with MDA.
